text: Akhiezer (, ) is a surname. * Aleksander Ilyich Akhiezer (; 1911 - 2000), a Jewish Belarusian-Soviet nuclear physicist * Naum Ilyich Akhiezer (; 1901 - 1980), a Jewish Belarusian-Soviet mathematician == See also == * Ahiezer (biblical figure) * Ahi'ezer (moshav) Category:Jewish surnames Category:Hebrew-language surnames pt:Akhiezer
title: Akhiezer
